participant_1.background:
I enjoy entertaining my former students and catching up on their lives.
i love to dance salsa.
I prefer comfortable, practical clothing that won't get in the way of my work.
i want to go back to school.
i have two sons that i am raising by myself.

i love to swim.
when i am stressed , i overeat.
if i were to be reincarnated , i would want to come back as a hippopotamus.

content.text: I am not sure what to do, I want to go back to school but i am not sure if i have the time.
If you really want to go back to school you should go for it! I went back to school at night and it was hard but it was worth it.
I would like to go to school at night but i have two kids and i am a single mom.
It sounds like you have a lot on your plate but i am sure you could find a way to make it work.
I am not sure how i would be able to find the time to do school work when i am already so busy with my kids.
There are a lot of online classes that you could take that would allow you to work on your studies at your own pace.
I have not thought about taking online classes but that might be a good option.
I think it would be a great option for you and it would allow you to still be a good mom to your kids.
Thank you for your help, i am going to look into online classes and see if it is something that i can do.
That is great! I am sure you will be able to do it.
I hope so, i would love to go back to school.
I know you will do great!
